subject: Playoff Games
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Beltran drove in two runs in the third and hit the decisive single in the 13th to give the Cardinals a win over the Dodgers in the opener of the N.L. Championship Series.
snippet: Carlos Beltran drove in two runs in the third and hit the decisive single in the 13th to give the Cardinals a win over the Dodgers in the opener of the N.L. Championship Series.
